SELECT c.id, c.title, let.NAME AS lecturerName, let.id AS lecturerId, let.career AS career, let.intro AS intro, let.head , let.level, c.buy_count AS buyCount, c.view_Count AS viewCount, c.cover, c.status, CONVERT ( c.price, DECIMAL ( 8, 2 ) ) AS price, c.lesson_num, des.description, sub.title AS oneCategory, su.title AS twoCategory FROM edu_course c INNER JOIN edu_course_description des ON c.id = des.id LEFT JOIN edu_lecturer let ON c.lecturer_id = let.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject sub ON c.category_pid = sub.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject su ON c.category_id = su.id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.lecturer_id, c.category_id, c.category_pid, c.title, CONVERT ( c.price, DECIMAL ( 8, 2 ) ) AS price, c.lesson_num, c.cover, c.buy_count, c.view_count, c.status , d.description FROM edu_course c INNER JOIN edu_course_description d WHERE c.id = d.id AND c.lecturer_id = #{id} AND c.status = "Publish"
